description: Create an API key in your Autocalls account and paste the value here. Get API key here -> https://app.autocalls.ai.

actions.name: sendSms
actions.description: Select an SMS capable phone number to send the SMS from

triggers.name: getAssistants
triggers.description: Triggers when assistants are fetched or updated in your Autocalls account.

triggers.description: Triggers for variables before connecting an inbound call.

triggers.description: Triggers when a phone call ends, with extracted variables.
